title: Winter Software Fellow
description:
Coding it Forward is placing talented early-career software engineers with the District of Columbia to tackle pressing automation challenges. Fellows benefit from a competitive wage, dedicated mentorship, professional development workshops, and access to our 700+ member alumni network. It's an excellent opportunity for recent graduates or those interested in taking the winter semester off for full-time, mission-driven work experience.

This role requires candidates to have experience in some or all of the following:

  • C#
  • REST APIs
  • Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
  • .NET
  • Bonus if you have any exposure to Robotic Process Automation (RPA)

Please note you must apply through our application portal by Sunday, November 16, 2025. Applications submitted via third-party websites will not be considered.
